attr.title: Table Tanks
attr.desc:
Be a tank, shoot other thanks! But beware, ammo is scarce so use it wisely! Battle through 25 boards of increasing difficulty, while outfitting your tank with cool upgrades!
1st Place Winner of HeartGameJam.
attr.inst: Install port then download TableTanks.zip free game from [here](https://rologfos.itch.io/table-tanks), extract it and copy all files to the tabletanks/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Install port then download TableTanks.zip free game from [here](https://rologfos.itch.io/table-tanks), extract it and copy all files to the tabletanks/gamedata folder.
